abstract: Dušan Kuciak (Slovak pronunciation: [ˈduʃan ˈkut͡sjak]; born 21 May 1985) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for the Polish T-Mobile Ekstraklasa side Legia Warsaw and the Slovakia national team.
comment: Dušan Kuciak (Slovak pronunciation: [ˈduʃan ˈkut͡sjak]; born 21 May 1985) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for the Polish T-Mobile Ekstraklasa side Legia Warsaw and the Slovakia national team.
